name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Robert MIMS, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.

casebody.head_matter:
414 A.2d 350
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Robert MIMS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 24, 1980.
Decided May 30, 1980.
Louis Lipschitz, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellant.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
